other_tests.findings: No mutations in the OTC gene; two novel heterozygous mutations c.649G>A (p.Gly217Arg) and c.706A>G (p.Arg236Gly) in the SLC25A15 gene.
Significantly reduced levels of IFNγ, IL-17A, and TNFα, and higher levels of IL-10 in the patient's PBMC culture supernatants.

Normal counts of NK and B cells; significantly higher counts of T cells, mainly due to an increase in the CD4+ T cell subset. Alterations in the distribution of naïve, central memory, effector memory, and terminally differentiated effector memory cells in both CD4+ and CD8+ T cell compartments.
Significantly reduced frequencies of plasmablasts, immature and memory B cells, and higher frequencies of mature B cells in the patient compared to controls.
